website_summaries.verdict: This is a very solid smart lock that offers a true convenience upgrade for your front door.
pros: The Kwikset Kevo is a uniquely convenient smart lock that can let you in with a single touch
The second-gen model is designed better than before, with a smaller interior footprint, easier installation and resistance against brute-force attacks
All "eKeys," including time-restricted ones, are now free and unlimited
cons: The second-gen Kevo no longer includes the helpful key fob accessory, but it still costs more than generation one

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this product, it drains the battery so quickly and it is not usable.
customer_reviews.text: We have owned this products twice. The first one kept draining the battery less than a month due to excessive draw of the power when lock turns. We worked with the warranty department and it acknowledged the product was faulty. We received a replacement but it behaved similarly to the first kevo. We called the warranty department again. Their response was that they will only work with us to test the product but there was no way they would refund the purchase price. To save your frustration, do not buy this product. Our battery cost has exceeded the kevo lock price on top of the kevo purchase
customer_reviews.author: Albatross1m

customer_reviews.title: Trash. Burns through batteries, touch function spotty, unlocks and locks itself.
customer_reviews.text: This lock is garbage. Basically I have to replace the batteries every month. Which means you need to recalibrate the key fobs each time. Which involves unscrewing cover and taking lock apart. The “touch” feature is spotty. You’ll End up standing in front of your door for 25seconds watching light spin feeling stupid waiting on technology to do what you can in 2 seconds. Also it would onlock itself randomly once batteries get low. Which is once a month. I would here it as I walked to my car, luckily. It’s very buggy and it was expensive with basically a life time donation to Duracell. Look elsewhere. But it was easy to install. For what it’s worth.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Devito

customer_reviews.title: May unlock your door while you’re away.
customer_reviews.text: After a year of use, we may replace these locks with regular locks unless Kwikset updates the program to correct a few issues. They use too much battery. They are slow to recognize that your phone is nearby - sometimes requiring you to open the app on your phone. The worst is that they lock or unlock by themselves, at random. A few times, we came home and the front door was unlocked. More often, we’d be sitting in the house, the the front door would lock by itself. We’ve also been locked out of the house a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Art I.

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Really simplifies getting inside in the rain
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for my dad and sister. They were very easy to install. Especially with the interactive instructions on the app. I was able to rekey both locks to work with the doorknob keys instead of having different keys for each. The actual app setup was very easy. For all the bad reviews there seems to be a lot of people who installed it and never did anything else. It is recommended to calibrate the lock do it can tell when your phone is inside versus outside. That way it can never be used to unlock the door while your phone is already inside.
customer_reviews.author: Schizm

customer_reviews.title: batteries die, can't stay connected, numerous design and function flaws
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2019 Jul 9 with the Hub. On my third set of brand new fresh timestamp Energizer batteries - the bolt striker is not impeded. You must have your Kevo app running at all times without power save. Even with it running, the lock fails to find your phone for confirming when leaving the house, or for unlocking on arrival -- phone held in hand 15 inches away in position used when calibrating. Installation has a screw placed inline with your doorknob so it's useless, battery replacement requires removing cover screws. Setup is not without retrying steps several times.
customer_reviews.author: FirefighterBlu3

customer_reviews.title: Love it, not going back to keys.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy. Works nearly everytime. No issues. Initially phone would not connect consistently. Issue was phone was not keeping app on in the background. The app must be allowed to run in the background, not put to sleep due to inactivity, etc., for the lock to work as soon as you are in front of the door. Regular alkaline batterys last about 5-6 months with average use. It is faster than using keys. I do recommend Kevo to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Klondike

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get this, but ended up returning it for two reasons: 1. You have to have the app running for it to work. It took me longer to get the app going than just using a key. 2. The motor to unlock the door was louder than I expected (I live in a condo and don't want to bother people), Not worth the money, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Mashek

customer_reviews.title: Too many problems. Will likely return
customer_reviews.text: The physical installation is easy enough. But load their app and the first it is says is how important it is to upgrade the lock firmware. Guess what? The download process doesn't work! You have to scour their website to find an obscure FAQ that instructs you to touch their lock while downloading. Why they didn't put that in their updated instructions, is mindboggling. But gets better. Try calling their tech support. An automated machine tells you their office closed and then reads off the hours they're open -- when you just called them during the hours when they say they're open!!! WTF?!?!
customer_reviews.author: Martin Kunert

customer_reviews.title: batteries run out in like 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: So many issues. Touch unlock is unreliabe, won't connect with my thermostat, batteries run out in like 2 weeks. Definitely not worth the money Update: in addition to the battery issue the lock's touch feature no longer works with iOS 11. And yes, i've updated to the latest kevo app, and yes i've deleted and re-added the app, tried on multiple devices, etc. please avoid this product
customer_reviews.author: jw

customer_reviews.title: Love it!! Never going back!!
customer_reviews.text: Loooove this product!! The best smart home enhancement investment. Discreet, looks and acts like a normal deadbolt but gives you way more features. You never have to take out your keys. You can lock it from bed if you hear a weird noise in the house. You can email keys to people and grant them access for variable lengths of time. Wonderful! Would recommend again and again. Only critique is that being on an entry door in upstate New York regular batteries drain in the cold after a month. Get a set of 8 max capacity rechargeables, we use amazon basics and haven’t had a problem since.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Total garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute biggest piece of crap ive ever wasted my money on. I spend 10 min. A day screwing with it to get into my house. I have had it for over a year and i hate it. It just went into a lock unlock loop that i couldn't stop I had to dismantle it to make it stop... total garbage
customer_reviews.author: Jimmo

customer_reviews.title: Great lock, love the hub, but hand sanitizers ruined it
customer_reviews.text: I love using the locks. sharing keys with housecleaners and house sitters. I have four locks and the hub and have it integrated with Alexa. She asked us if we wanted to lock an unlocked door as a "hunch" when we asked her to turn off the bedroom lamps. Only complaint i have is the covid-19 use of hand sanitizers and lysol wipes ruined the surface.
customer_reviews.author: S. Palermo

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get to work
customer_reviews.text: Really would have liked this to work and even with the other reviews gave it a shot. Already have Kwikset through out the house and wanted to keep everything the same. The lock install was a breeze, downloaded the app and used the virtual guide without an issue. Once installed looked amazing and the re-keying of the lock was a breeze and operated as a dead bolt perfectly. The automated portion just would not work, kept clicking and showing that it was binding. Took the lock off the door and had the same issue. Could not get the software upgrade to download, but didn't spend much time with that because of the mechanical issue.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description of capabilities regarding Alexa connection.
customer_reviews.text: If your buying this lock with the impression that you can control and monitor via wifi you will be disappointed. That requires another 141.00 purchase of the Kevo plus. This Gen2 is no better than the Gen1, only difference is it is capable of upgrading to wifi. When I purchased was under the impression that the Gen2 would connect to Alexa via Bluetooth but that is not true. Don't get fooled. After a tense consult with Kēvo CS decided to send back. We'll see what Gen3 looks like.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great and Okay Performance
customer_reviews.text: Look looks great and functions well. There are times when the lock struggles to detect the bluetooth signal from our phones which prompts the need to open the app and manually trigger "OPEN" to get the lock to respond. The lock also seems to eat batteries. Averaging low battery warnings every 3 months. This is not our primary access to our home.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Felcher

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this product
customer_reviews.text: Very unreliable. Initially it worked relatively well but within 2 months probably worked 1 out of 10 times on the first try. At two years I've completely stopped using the touch feature or app control. The app usually takes 30-60 seconds to connect if at all and the touch feature simply has been reliably nonfunctional. Avoid this product smart locks in general don't seem to be good enough in 2019 but particularly this iteration.
customer_reviews.author: Cory M

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed and will return it again
customer_reviews.text: Got one from Amazon, cannot get it work properly so I returned it. And after that I bought one from nearest Orchard Supply Hardware and tried to install it again, still I cannot get it work for the update process keeps forever. In my case I can only install it upside down for my door was right handed while it provides no such version. So disappointed and will return it again.
customer_reviews.author: floryou

customer_reviews.title: Certified Refurbished was sent but I purchased it new :(
customer_reviews.text: This seller sent a certified refurbished smart lock which is annoying because I purchased the new lock. I waited so long to get it so I just installed it. Aside from that, it works wonderful and we are in love! No more rummaging through my diaper bag to find my keys. We have a push to start car so the only time I ever needed keys was for the door. So far so good on getting in and out/sending e-keys!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish it worked EVERY time.
customer_reviews.text: Love it when it works but we have been having problems with one of ours not being able to communicate with our phones. Then you have to clear it and when you do that it erases everyone you want to have access a key again. Not a huge deal but could be if someone showed up that didnt have a actual physical key and the thing wouldn't work. I have came home to people waiting in the driveway because they could not get it to work. If it would work all the time i would give it 10 stars because its super nice when it does work.
customer_reviews.author: Donny

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money/time. Doesn’t work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Worthless product. Bought one for each entry door of my home- none work like they should. We have the fobs and the app, and most days we end up having to leave through the garage because our main door does not want to lock. To get in the house, we have to open the app, and manually hit unlock. Even when it works, you could unlock the door with a key 10x and still beat the speed of this lock. The lights circle and circle to find you, then it will go- but not with any speed. I’m heading to Home Depot to pick up regular deadbolts. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Complete garbage. Very finicky to install. Just a little bit too tight and the deadbolt doesn’t engage. Little bit to loose and the whole thing moves around. Battery lasts only two or three weeks before it dies completely no matter what. Half the time my phone doesn’t recognize that it’s even available. The other half of the time it wouldn’t recognize that I was touching the deadbolt to make it unlock. A complete waste of money. Ended up just buying a different style that’s not Bluetooth. Unable to return it because I’m now out of the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Caesare

customer_reviews.title: Fifteen percent that’s how often it works
customer_reviews.text: Terrible purchase. Works about 15% of the time. Wasted so much time waiting for it to work. I’ve calibrated more than I care to admit. Also, not easy to install of change the batteries. Go with the sense one. I have that one and it works 100% of the time. I payed a premium for this thing. Even at 80% off I would stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Beach boy buys

customer_reviews.title: The cell to connect does take a few second more but my wife and I still like it. We can give my dog watcher the ...
customer_reviews.text: Missing screws for the housing. Lock was ok to install despite missing screws. Once set up works perfectly. It’s takes a second or two to unlock using the key fob. The cell to connect does take a few second more but my wife and I still like it. We can give my dog watcher the virtual key and get her in when we are gone. In will our new locks on garage and front door next. Can rekey them as well with included took. Will add star when screws are resolved
customer_reviews.author: Dan Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Looks great.  Have to see how long batteries last.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working with the FOB. Replaced the FOB battery and it worked again. Now it has stopped, Will not work with the FOB or the iPhone now and will not pair with the iPhone after a reset. I've had it installed for one month. Thank goodness we carry keys for the door. Replaced the batteries in the lock. It works great again. Old batteries test on the meter as being good. Will have to see how long these batteries last.
customer_reviews.author: M. Seebeck

customer_reviews.title: IT. DOES. NOT. WORK
customer_reviews.text: Google this lock to find out how many complaints and poorly conceived fixes there are for this device. If you install it, it will work rarely enough that you'll be forced to carry your key. Then what was the point of this lock? This is truly one of the most poorly functioning devices I have ever purchased. If Yugo made locks, even they would make a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get an August!
customer_reviews.text: Very few features work with Android. Doesn't work with LG devices at all. If you have an iPhone you're good to do though.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Good to have medical emergency Incase you can’t get to lock open with your phone
customer_reviews.text: This lock works great. It installed good. After instal and have it paired to your phone. I calibrated the phone and lock the lock worked with touch fantastic. It also locked fine with the phone app from my bedroom to lock and unlock door. I also got the gateway easy to pair works great. And works good with Alexa. I highly recommend this lock and gateway
customer_reviews.author: T. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. The touch to function nearly never works. I essentially paid $230 for a lock that I still have to use my key on. They update the firmware and promise improvements, but it still rarely works. Also, for a "smart" lock, it has no z wave or direct alexa/google home integration. It does have IFTTT, but only as a reaction (this means you can't unlock or lock the app using a IFTTT recipe, only start a recipe as a result of doing something with the lock). This is curious because they sell z wave smart locks. I can't implore you enough, stay away from this extremely poor item.
customer_reviews.author: James Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should!
customer_reviews.text: Love this lock. It works like it’s suppose to as far as locking & unlocking. Very easy to install. I chose to install with the built-in mini movie few because it showed u how to do each step. Just easier. I also bought the Kēvo plus connected hub. However, it doesn’t log each & everytime the lock is locked / unlocked. No biggie to me tho as their is only 2 people who live here. Other then that, I am very happy. It’s nice wen ur all snuggled in bed & checking to see if your door is locked is at your fingertips. 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Stay away at all costs
customer_reviews.text: You will not be happy with this purchase. Not a single time I use it am I happy with the response time. More than half the time it doesn't work at all. My wife and I have both resorted to using keys, unfortunately, when we do, half the time it detects a touch and locks or unlocks 30 sec. after we used the key, creating issues. You will either 1) lock yourself out of the house, 2) spend longer locking and unlocking, or 3) experience both, all the time. DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Behrman

customer_reviews.title: not working not user friendly enough
customer_reviews.text: I installed this within a short time - checked the locking and it was all working . When we put the cover all of a sudden we get errors that the deadbolt is stuck. Followed the instructions again to get the lock learning set - the door handling. process several time and it still not working. Very disappointing. Secondly each time there is a need to perform this door handling process or a software update you have to in-screw and remove the cover- it is just such so annoying and not user friendly at all. So unfortunately we are returning this lock. very very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Muthoni

customer_reviews.title: Touch n go
customer_reviews.text: Love the lock. It’s great because I love being able to go out, take an Uber and never carry my keys. It’s not the first time I’ve installed a door lock before but this took me a little while so what the video on install and the batteries that came with it burnt out real quick. Not sure if it was the quality of battery or the lock just burns through batteries. I don’t think it should go through batteries in 2 months. Don’t need to be locked out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The lock is faulthy: it opens whenever it wants to, if connected to phone app. Very creepy and dangerously unreliable in the middle of night. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: O. Smith

customer_reviews.title: not bad some intermittent issues
customer_reviews.text: not bad some intermittent issues, finally got battery low message after 6 months so battery life isnt bad. Occasionally it will unpair but otherwise relatively satisfied, have only been using it via bluetooth for now, not upgraded. update 11/2018 over a year use. Still decent did dissapear a couple times needed to be physically reset but thats it. overall good product works as promised. Haven not upgraded it with the wifi module yet.
customer_reviews.author: valeri

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted this to work.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with it, never could get our phones to pair, ( Pixel XL, and gs7 ). Key fobs did not always work, when the did it would have been faster to use key. We ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Kaine

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, seldom actually locks or unlocks via touch
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be very unreliable as far as the touch to lock/unlock so I bought the Kevo Plus so I could automate via my Homebridge setup. This worked fine as I could automate the locking/unlocking to along with alarming/disarming the alarm system. Unfortunately Kwikset added a Captcha to their website which broke the automation for myself and many others.
customer_reviews.author: Jim K

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable. Wait for next generation
customer_reviews.text: Very unreliable performance. Trying to get it to activate is kind of a joke in the family. Will not be so funny when the weather turns cold. Looking to sell on Ebay now that my Amazon return policy has expired before we really got to try to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: GOOD LOCK IF YOU DON'T MIND WAITING AND WAITING AND WAITING FOR IT TO OPEN
customer_reviews.text: I would suggest you bring your kindle with you when you leave the house. This way you'll have something to do when your waiting for the lock to actually lock or open. It's actually a shock when it does work fast but it's few and far between. I have reverted to using my key which is much faster. Don't waste your money on this! I'm sure there are much better options.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrold

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable, Need more develop. There’s better products for the same price.
customer_reviews.text: Unreliable, Almost every time I need to tap the lick twice to work, One day I got trapped outside in a Houston summer with my Wife and Baby.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Moreira

customer_reviews.title: Trash. Trash. Trash.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, worst thing I have ever purchased. Nothing but a fight since day one. 6 months in it completely stopped working. New batteries just leave it in a state saying the batteries are still bad. It goes in the trash as soon as a different lock arrives.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great lock! It works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Great lock! It works like a charm. I would highly recommend this lock. It is so handy to just give it a swipe and it's open sesame! The cell service, where I live, is intermittent but the lock works everytime! I am so glad I chose a Kwikset.
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: Guess it's a hit or miss with quality?
customer_reviews.text: It worked for about a month. You know, the time you can return for a refund. Then it started acting up and finally stopped working. I followed the troubleshooting to find that the batteries that came with it had leaked. I cleaned as much of the corrosion as possible and replaced the batteries. Again, it worked for a month before the batteries died. I replaced them again, which requires removing the outer cover. However, now it wouldn't turn the lock. Tried troubleshooting again, completely removed the lock and put it back together. All that ended up happening is the motor finally stopped turning. Also, the damn app wants to always be running and harasses you if you close it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Reliability issues
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had several Kevos before. This one keeps randomly locking and unlocking itself when no one is touching the app. That’s a huge problem
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly R. Siegrist

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, Fast, and Flawless!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using the 2nd generation Kevo for 9 months and have no complaints. I absolutely love the convenience it offers our large, busy family! While I have never had issues with the touch-to-open functionality, two users in our home occasionally had to swipe the lock multiple times before it opened. This is no longer an issue, as the touch-to-open functionality has improved with recent app updates. The original installation of the deadbolt was also fairly straightforward. We did not have any issues with the lock being too close to window in our door, as other reviewers had mentioned. Love, love, love this lock and will be purchasing another for our other entry!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it for 3 months now and have had to replace the batteries two times. When replacing the batteries I have had to re sync with my phone and fob. Not easy to do everytime. Pain in the ass actually.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Soto

customer_reviews.title: good for door not always use.
customer_reviews.text: bluetooth connect too slow, most time you need waiting and then unlock your cell phone to connect bluetooth to open door.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great tech, close to perfect (not quite)
customer_reviews.text: Great product. A few nit-picks during setup / the Bluetooth pairing isn't perfect, software update process is long, but overall this was a huge upgrade for our 1928 house! My wife loves being able to go workout and only take her phone vs keys+purse, I love coming home with your hands full and not fishing around (or standing out in the snow/rain) for my keys. Best part is the finish pretty much perfectly matches the original door I restored (along with a new Kwikset handle set). Bought a Milwaukee jig to drill it at the proper backspacing, well worth the additional $30 - most people wouldn't have to do this vs replacing an existing deadbolt).
customer_reviews.author: David Moffitt

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Wasted 2 hrs trying to get it work. Tapping the lock occasionally locked it. Phone wouldn't communicate with lock most of the time. I got the Schlage Encore and it worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Handyman Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Updates are rough.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I read the reviews after I purchased 2 locks and a hub, mistake. Physical installation is easy but the connection part is almost impossible. I'm guessing it uses NFC to make its first connection. At the first connection it must update and that is the problem. After many attempts I removed the lock and set it on a table, unloaded the app and started from scratch. With my phone 2" from the lock for around 30 minutes the lock updated and everything worked as designed. Same process for the 2nd lock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Key Features (touch to unlock & app unlock) Non-functional
customer_reviews.text: We've had this product for 5 months on our back door, and have been very disappointed in it. During this time, we've had ongoing issues with both the touch to unlock (works about 5% of the time) and unlocking using the iOS application (requires the app to be force quit every time). The touch to lock feature does work, as well as unlocking with the provided key. We've decided to replace this lock with a touch pad one, which has been 100% reliable. I would not recommend purchasing this lock.
customer_reviews.author: Kory Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, not multi user friendly.
customer_reviews.text: The concept is cool, but we were not happy with the fact that only one person can “own” the home. We wished this came with a multi user option. If more than one adult (spouse) lives in a home, the second needs to be granted a key to use the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D.

customer_reviews.title: Waist of money.
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied! When it works it is great but unfortunately 98 percent of the time it does not work properly. It is a waste of money. I think the issue Stems from the lock technology not being able to Keep up with the phone technology. You are continuously having to delete the app off your phone and reinstall to keep it working properly.
customer_reviews.author: Db

customer_reviews.title: When it works it’s awesome, just hardly ever works
customer_reviews.text: I even moved my wireless router to within 10 feet unobstructed view and my phone still won’t connect to it most times. I have recalibrated about 10 Times doesn’t help. Almost always faster to use a key. Looks nice and seems pretty durable. Would be great if it worked consistently and were able to open remotely without a paid subscription.
customer_reviews.author: JW MILLER

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy and it works well.
customer_reviews.text: It works well. I never use the key. It replaced a standard Kwikset lock so I didn’t have to do any drilling or prep work to install the Kēvo. We’re both really pleased with it. I recommend unlocking the battery door when you install it so you have easy access to the inside if needed. You’ll know what I mean when you see the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Jaquish

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: terrible device, I had touch pad locks for years and they were great. no part of me would ever purchase this again. the entire family is stuck using keys because it rarely if ever works set up was a nightmare, the app almost never connects. Just get something else and save yourself years of aggravation.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Buggy phone connectivity
customer_reviews.text: this was a straightforward install and I was able to get it working out of the box. Also added the Kevo Plus option to make this WiFi enabled. Problem is, 3 times since the first install I’ve had to reinstall al the soft keys. It just quits working and the phones can’t connect to it anymore over Bluetooth or WiFi. Only fix I’ve found is to factory reset the whole thing. Would not consider buying this again until they make some significant improvements in communication and app design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE SECOND TIME I PURCHASED A 2ND GEN ...
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE SECOND TIME I PURCHASED A 2ND GEN KEVO AND IT DOES NOT WORK ... I RETURNED THE FIRST ONE FOR A REFUND....WILL DO THE SAME WHEN I GET A MANUAL LOCK....I GIVE UP
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seller
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quick and in perfect condition. Sadly I had to return it because I found this particular lock would not be as compatible with my existing smart devices as I would need it to be. I was disappointed only that I can’t use it. The seller was great however and the return went very smooth. I would buy again in a heartbeat from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Lkim

customer_reviews.title: seems like a crap shoot if it will work
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about 8 months now. I should have listened to the other reviews. 50% of the time Bluetooth does not work. We have 4 iPhones one iPhone and three iPhone 8s. seems like a crap shoot if it will work. Touch the lock blue spinner. nothing. Open my phone make sure app is opened. Close the app relaunch works. Some reason this will not auto connect 100% of the time. I also notice if I start my vehicle my phone connects to the Bluetooth there and now the comms with the lock are gone. Tech is not ready.
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Works 1 of 10 attempts. You end up Standing ...
customer_reviews.text: Works 1 of 10 attempts. You end up Standing at the front door tapping it repeatedly, it’s quicker and easier to just use the key. I have recalibrate the lock multiple times with no success. Even when I take the phone out of my pocket no luck. I’m going to keep the lock unfortunately as I have already replaced all the door handlesand other locks in my house to match this locks color. All these 5 star reviews must be paid adds. I have had this product for a week and it doesn’t work at all. Extremely unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Would want to give  negative star if possible
customer_reviews.text: 2 months after purchase the battery started to drain out and had to replace them frequently and would take at least 3-4 tries to open or close the door, and finally 4 months after purchase the lock does not work complete , have tried multiple reset and getting new keys from the app. This is just and manual lock now with a fancy led light .T he package did not include any spare keys, there was only 1 key.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Works for my needs.
customer_reviews.text: Works for my needs. I've had a few times when it doesn't connect, but I can't say if it's the lock or my phone. In these cases opening the app solves the problem.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: Door lock jams too easily, the deadbolt is very sensitive to slight friction
customer_reviews.text: Door lock jams too easily, the deadbolt is very sensitive to slight friction .. you have to make sure that if you're the one drilling the holes, that the door is naturally aligned with the framed before drilling bcuz if you there any slice disturbance in the closure the lock won't lock and manually need to be reset to lock.. or you just have to be there to make sure the door is closed completely.
customer_reviews.author: BS

customer_reviews.title: Your phone might not WORK!
customer_reviews.text: CHECK your phone first for compatibility. My phone was not so I had to use my wife's. The instructions weren't too bad, but could be better. After set up it seems to be working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Works like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Nice not having to get keys out. and being able to check if it's locked from the comfort of your bed (because the wife is going to ask) is wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised, just wish I could use Siri to lock and unlock door by voice at times. Very nice when hands are full of groceries. Just tap lock and you’re in.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great buy that doesn’t leave keys floating around
customer_reviews.text: Great lock. Like being able to assign keys or delete them with ease through the app. Also like that it looks like a standard deadbolt with keyed access. Battery life is pretty good as I tend to get around 3 months +/- on a set of batteries. The app will let you know ahead of time that your batteries need to be changed.
customer_reviews.author: antonio gamez

customer_reviews.title: Quick to open, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Touch to open, and allowing the whole family to use digital keys has been a huge help. We have had minor issues with it, such as having to reload the app from time to time. So far we are enjoying it. I would definitely recommend it. (2nd gen)
customer_reviews.author: B. mcbeen

customer_reviews.title: Meh....
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like this AT ALL. The directions are confusing and most of the time it doesn’t work, so we’ve stopped using the phone feature.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Zeller

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: No problems working with pixel 4 xl or iPhone xr, iPhone does make you have the app running in background for Bluetooth to work
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: nice but if you want a smarthome device it doesnt play nice.
customer_reviews.text: I didnt give it 5 stars because I love the look and the way it works. I DO NOT love that they make you buy additional items for it to work with any smart home system. $220 then you buy a Kevo plus antenna that is another $99 yeah i dont think so.
customer_reviews.author: Conlee

customer_reviews.title: I ordered it and installed like the directions said and from the start it did ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely awful. I ordered it and installed like the directions said and from the start it did not work. No colors in the lights, touch feature did not work. I have contacted customer service what has now been 10 times and every single time they have delayed getting me a new device. This lock has never worked. Customer Service has lied to be about "expediting" my replacement part to get me off the phone. The supervisor was rude. The lock still doesn't work. I'm going to buy another brand. This is awful.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Silvi

customer_reviews.title: Issues with false representation
customer_reviews.text: Still working with the device fob does not work, so far.... Phone can not pair with it and the only thing it seems to be capable of doing is automatically locking the door so I hope in some way it will work.... Unfortunately it might end up being sent back if it does not work in the manner I read about lights in the front are also not working still will test its out however may look for an alternative. This was to be the newst generation it is not from what I see hence the lower price and listing it in correctly I do not like being mislead.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore T.M. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: not recommend
customer_reviews.text: After 4 months of use the touch sense stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Edward L. Heins

customer_reviews.title: Very cool and hi tech
customer_reviews.text: Very cool and hi tech. At night the blue circle glows from a distance giving the look of a security alarm of sorts. Locks work great by wifi/smartphones, Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way to slow. Wanted it so I did not ...
customer_reviews.text: Way to slow. Wanted it so I did not have to go down and up stairs to let someone in. I was afraid my guests would leave before this would actually work
customer_reviews.author: tony c

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: The unit worked for about a week, then became inconsistent, then the battery becomes critical and loses power 2-3 times per week.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Carlson

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This is much easier to use than a key. My lock is consistent with other reviews, where touch does not work about half of the time. Nevertheless, I can always use the app on my phone to unlock: I think the hub is needed for unlocking with the app.
customer_reviews.author: Christien Gillis

customer_reviews.title: Piece Of Junk
customer_reviews.text: I expected more from a name like Kwikset, but they missed the boat here. Worked for 2 months intermittently, hasn't worked now for almost 5 months even after new batteries and reloading. Pulling it and going with August!
customer_reviews.author: Richard N.

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes it works and sometimes it doesn't
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it works and sometimes it doesn't. I'm never quite sure when its going to work. But at least the color of the light clearly indicates whether it is locking or unlocking. It does look nice and was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: D. Krahl

customer_reviews.title: Reliability is horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is not good at all. Every month or so it will just go crazy and won't work with any of the devices. I have to go and set the thing up all over again in order for it to work. When and if it works, it's nice. Reliability sucks though. Waste of money, should have bought a regular keypad lock.
customer_reviews.author: karo Darmoyan

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable.
customer_reviews.text: After multiple conversations I still never know if it’s gonna take 5 seconds or 20mimites to get into my house. I have replaced this product
customer_reviews.author: Stitch

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't always work, I have to touch it several ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't always work , I have to touch it several times before it opens . Sometimes I have to actually pull my phone out and literally place it on the lock to have it work , which I might as well have a key! Addendum. So , this lock stopped working today. Too late to return unable to get any customer service Recommend you save your money and not buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never Again
customer_reviews.text: Just absolute crap - paid a lot of money for this thing to be delivered to Australia and it rarely works. My 18 moth old enjoys watching the lights go around in circles as I continuously touch the lock waiting for it to respond to my phone. It's quicker to hunt around for the key.
customer_reviews.author: Mackster

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended 90 percent of the time. Every once in a while it will not detect the phone resulting in me having to pull my phone out of my pocket and unlock the phone using the app.
customer_reviews.author: HK2006

customer_reviews.title: awesome product would have given 5 stars except it dose ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome product would have given 5 stars except it dose not always stay connected. and takes a few tries to lock/unlock. Works better opening via app with Keco Plus when not home. need to improve reaction and response when near it.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Comp service

customer_reviews.title: SLOW, not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This lock is not worth it! it Takes a very long time for your phone to connect every time you try to use it. It’s so long that you could get out your keys and open the door or definitely type in a keypad code. We have the hub too which is supposed to help. Total waste of money. I wish I had just bought a keypad lock like we have on our garage door.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome!!!! Works perfect and does just what I wanted. I would recommend this product yo anyone looking to upgrade to a smart, have ease with installation and usage, as well as have it link to both the Nest and Ring doorbell. It even looks great, 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Janet Kerr

customer_reviews.title: THERE IS NO REAL SUPPORT FOR SETTING UP OR MAINTAINING
customer_reviews.text: THE ELECTRONICS ARE USELESS. MANUFACTURER DOES NOT RESPOND TO ISSUES. A WASTE OF GOOD MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lotto

customer_reviews.title: Go with a different brand.
customer_reviews.text: This thing loses bluetooth reception all the time. I sometimes stand at my door for 2 minutes just waiting. Pretty much defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Horrigan

customer_reviews.title: Never works on the first touch
customer_reviews.text: Never works on the first touch. Most of the time I have to touch it 2 or 3 times. And usually only works when I have my phone in my hand with the Kevo app open. All software is up to date. I keep thinking it will improve. But it has not. Do not buy this smart lock. Buy something else. I wish kevo would give a refund and I could move on to something else
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: worked well for the first few months, then problems set in. We could hear the servo straining to turn lock, but would not turn, turning by hand was very stiff. removed and inspected lock assembly, however the problem appeared too be in the geared internal components. would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: kyle beard

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding and easy
customer_reviews.text: Works amazingly well, had to hire an installer and then bring him back to reinstall after the original lock failed. All in all I’m very happy the product works great!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Silver

customer_reviews.title: Not great luck with this piece....
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really line up with the previous door cuttings and therefore, doesn't operate properly. Maybe you'll have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Hi-Tech is fun but not always realistic
customer_reviews.text: This is my second attempt in trying to get this thing to work. One minute it works, next time it's not working. Gonna try one more time before I return it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve luyando

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't connect all the time. Sometimes I have to force shut down the app and restart it.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Not like other keyless entry. No code to put in. Just have your phone in your purse or pocket hit the lock and it opens or locks. Very easy especially when you have a lot of packages.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine cantrell

customer_reviews.title: TECH NOT READY FOR MAINSTREAM
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT WORK! AVOID! It rarely works. About 1 out of 20 times. Every two weeks or so we need to reset it, and we've reinstalled the app about 10 times in 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Nerd Mentor

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: App software doesnt work batteries die very quick overall disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Drury

customer_reviews.title: Good concept
customer_reviews.text: Great concept, appears to be quality made, looks great... but Bluetooth technology appears to be a bit slow and sometimes faulty
customer_reviews.author: Evan Johnson

product_meta.title: Kwikset - Kevo 99250-203 Kevo 2nd Gen Bluetooth Touch-to-Open Deadbolt Smart Lock Featuring SmartKey Security, Venetian Bronze
feature_bullets: Your Smartphone is now your key touch to open convenience with the 2nd generation Kevo
Kevo 2nd Gen now works with Alexa voice commands (requires Kevo Plus hub, sold separately for $99 via Kevo App)
Remote lock access & monitoring requires Kevo Plus hub, sold separately for $99 via Kevo App
3rd Gen Kevo App provides faster and more reliable connection. Smaller and sleeker metal interior with improved install experience
Now get FREE ekeys! Send and manage eKey access via smartphone - receive notifications and monitor lock history
It is recommended to review the instruction and troubleshooting manuals provided in the description section before use to install the product correctly
Works with Fob (sold separately) or traditional key with new advanced SmartKey security
Works with select iOS and Android devices (wider compatibility with updated Google Play Kevo app which determines full and partial compatibility) please check compatibility (below) before purchase
Smart Home compatibility with Amazon Alexa, Ring Doorbell, Skybell, Nest Learning Thermostat, select Honeywell Thermostats, Android Wear and IFTTT
